trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell System Requirements
trans-unit.target: Requisitos del sistema de Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell System Requirements
trans-unit.target: Requisitos del sistema de Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: This topic lists the system requirements for Windows PowerShell 3.0 and Windows PowerShell 4.0, and for special features, such as Windows PowerShell Integrated Scripting Environment (ISE), CIM commands, and workflows.
trans-unit.target: En este tema se enumeran los requisitos del sistema de Windows PowerShell 3.0 y Windows PowerShell 4.0, así como de características especiales, como Entorno de scripting integrado (ISE) de Windows PowerShell, comandos CIM y flujos de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: Windows® 8.1 and Windows Server® 2012 R2 include all required programs.
trans-unit.target: Windows® 8.1 y Windows Server® 2012 R2 incluyen todos los programas necesarios.

trans-unit.source: This topic is designed for users of earlier releases of Windows.
trans-unit.target: Este tema está diseñado para usuarios de versiones anteriores de Windows.

trans-unit.source: Operating System Requirements
trans-unit.target: Requisitos del sistema operativo

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 4.0 runs on the following versions of Windows.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 4.0 se ejecuta en las siguientes versiones de Windows.

trans-unit.source: Windows 8.1, installed by default
trans-unit.target: Windows 8.1, instalado de manera predeterminada

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2012 R2, installed by default
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2012 R2, instalado de manera predeterminada

trans-unit.source: Windows® 7 with Service Pack 1, install [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=293881) to run Windows PowerShell 4.0
trans-unit.target: Windows® 7 con Service Pack 1: instale [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=293881) para ejecutar Windows PowerShell 4.0

trans-unit.source: Windows Server® 2008 R2 with Service Pack 1, install [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=293881) to run Windows PowerShell 4.0
trans-unit.target: Windows Server® 2008 R2 con Service Pack 1: instale [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=293881) para ejecutar Windows PowerShell 4.0

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 3.0 runs on the following versions of Windows.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 3.0 se ejecuta en las siguientes versiones de Windows.

trans-unit.source: Windows 8, installed by default
trans-unit.target: Windows 8, instalado de manera predeterminada

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2012, installed by default
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2012, instalado de manera predeterminada

trans-unit.source: Windows® 7 with Service Pack 1, install [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) to run Windows PowerShell 3.0
trans-unit.target: Windows® 7 con Service Pack 1: instale [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) para ejecutar Windows PowerShell 3.0

trans-unit.source: Windows Server® 2008 R2 with Service Pack 1, install [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) to run Windows PowerShell 3.0
trans-unit.target: Windows Server® 2008 R2 con Service Pack 1: instale [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) para ejecutar Windows PowerShell 3.0

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2008 with Service Pack 2, install [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) to run Windows PowerShell 3.0
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2008 con Service Pack 2: instale [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) para ejecutar Windows PowerShell 3.0

trans-unit.source: Microsoft .NET Framework Requirements
trans-unit.target: Requisitos de Microsoft .NET Framework

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 4.0 requires the full installation of Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 4.0 requiere la instalación completa de Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5.

trans-unit.source: Windows 8.1 and Windows Server 2012 R2 include Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 by default.
trans-unit.target: Windows 8.1 y Windows Server 2012 R2 incluyen Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 de manera predeterminada.

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 3.0 requires the full installation of Microsoft .NET Framework 4.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 3.0 requiere la instalación completa de Microsoft .NET Framework 4.

trans-unit.source: Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012 include Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 by default, which fulfills this requirement.
trans-unit.target: Windows 8 y Windows Server 2012 incluyen Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 de manera predeterminada, con lo que se cumple este requisito.

trans-unit.source: To install Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 (dotNetFx45\_Full\_setup.exe), see [Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919) on the Microsoft Download Center.
trans-unit.target: Para instalar Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 (dotNetFx45_Full_setup.exe), consulte [Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919) en el Centro de descarga de Microsoft.

trans-unit.source: To install the full installation of Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (dotNetFx40\_Full\_setup.exe), see [Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (Web Installer)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212931) on the Microsoft Download Center.
trans-unit.target: Para realizar la instalación completa de Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (dotNetFx40_Full_setup.exe), consulte [Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (Web Installer)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212931) en el Centro de descarga de Microsoft.

trans-unit.source: WS\-Management 3.0
trans-unit.target: WS-Management 3.0

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 3.0 and Windows PowerShell 4.0 require WS\-Management 3.0, which supports the WinRM service and WSMan protocol.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 3.0 and Windows PowerShell 4.0 requieren WS-Management 3.0, que admite el servicio WinRM y el protocolo WSMan.

trans-unit.source: This program is included in Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows 8, Windows Server 2012, Windows Management Framework 4.0, and Windows Management Framework 3.0.
trans-unit.target: Este programa está incluido en Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows 8, Windows Server 2012, Windows Management Framework 4.0 y Windows Management Framework 3.0.

trans-unit.source: Windows Management Instrumentation 3.0
trans-unit.target: Instrumental de administración de Windows 3.0

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 3.0 and Windows PowerShell 4.0 require Windows Management Instrumentation 3.0 (WMI).
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 3.0 y Windows PowerShell 4.0 requiere Instrumental de administración de Windows 3.0 (WMI).

trans-unit.source: This program is included in Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows 8, Windows Server 2012, Windows Management Framework 4.0, and Windows Management Framework 3.0.
trans-unit.target: Este programa está incluido en Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows 8, Windows Server 2012, Windows Management Framework 4.0 y Windows Management Framework 3.0.

trans-unit.source: If this program is not installed on the computer, features that require WMI, such as CIM commands, do not run.
trans-unit.target: Si este programa no está instalado en el equipo, las características que requieren WMI, como los comandos CIM, no se ejecutan.

trans-unit.source: Common Language Runtime 4.0
trans-unit.target: Common Language Runtime 4.0

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 3.0 and Windows PowerShell 4.0 are compiled against Common Language Runtime (CLR) 4.0.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 3.0 y Windows PowerShell 4.0 se compilan en Common Language Runtime (CLR) 4.0.

trans-unit.source: Graphical User Interface Requirements
trans-unit.target: Requisitos de la interfaz gráfica de usuario

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell is a console\-based application that does not require a graphical user interface.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell es una aplicación basada en consola que no requiere una interfaz gráfica de usuario.

trans-unit.source: As such, is it well suited to computers that do not have screens or monitors, or a user interface, such as the Server Core installation options of Windows Server 2012 R2 or Windows Server 2012.
trans-unit.target: Por lo tanto, es idónea para equipos que no tienen pantallas, monitores ni interfaz de usuario, como las opciones de instalación de Server Core de Windows Server 2012 R2 o Windows Server 2012.

trans-unit.source: However, some items, such as the following, require a graphical user interface.
trans-unit.target: Sin embargo, algunos elementos, como los siguientes, requieren una interfaz gráfica de usuario.

trans-unit.source: For details, see the help topic for each item.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, vea el tema de ayuda de cada elemento.

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell Integrated Scripting Environment (ISE)
trans-unit.target: Entorno de scripting integrado (ISE) de Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.target: Out-Gridview

trans-unit.source: Parameters
trans-unit.target: Parámetros

trans-unit.source: **ShowWindow** parameter of the [Get-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/1f46eeb4-49d7-4bec-bb29-395d9b42f54a) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: Parámetro **ShowWindow** del cmdlet [Get-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/1f46eeb4-49d7-4bec-bb29-395d9b42f54a).

trans-unit.source: **ShowSecurityDescriptorUI** parameter of the [Register-PSSessionConfiguration](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/e9152ae2-bd6d-4056-9bc7-dc1893aa29ea) and [Set-PSSessionConfiguration](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/b21fbad3-1759-4260-b206-dcb8431cd6ea) cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: Parámetro **ShowSecurityDescriptorUI** de los cmdlets [Register-PSSessionConfiguration](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/e9152ae2-bd6d-4056-9bc7-dc1893aa29ea) y [Set-PSSessionConfiguration](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/b21fbad3-1759-4260-b206-dcb8431cd6ea).

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell Engine Requirements
trans-unit.target: Requisitos del motor de Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 4.0 is designed to be backwards compatible with Windows PowerShell 3.0 and Windows PowerShell 2.0.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 4.0 está diseñado para ser compatible con versiones anteriores de Windows PowerShell 3.0 y Windows PowerShell 2.0.

trans-unit.source: Cmdlets, providers, snap\-ins, modules, and scripts written for Windows PowerShell 2.0 and Windows PowerShell 3.0 run unchanged in Windows PowerShell 4.0.
trans-unit.target: Los cmdlets, proveedores, complementos, módulos y scripts escritos para Windows PowerShell 2.0 y Windows PowerShell 3.0 se ejecutan sin cambios en Windows PowerShell 4.0.

trans-unit.source: However, due to a change in the runtime activation policy in Microsoft .NET Framework 4, Windows PowerShell host programs that were written for Windows PowerShell 2.0 and compiled with Common Language Runtime (CLR) 2.0 cannot run without modification in Windows PowerShell 3.0, which is compiled with CLR 4.0.
trans-unit.target: Sin embargo, debido a un cambio en la directiva de activación de tiempo de ejecución en Microsoft .NET Framework 4, los programas de host de Windows PowerShell escritos para Windows PowerShell 2.0 y compilados con Common Language Runtime (CLR) 2.0 no se pueden ejecutar sin modificaciones en versiones posteriores de Windows PowerShell 3.0, que está compilado con CLR 4.0.

trans-unit.source: The Windows PowerShell 2.0 engine requires Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0.50727 at a minimum.
trans-unit.target: El motor de Windows PowerShell 2.0 requiere Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0.50727 como mínimo.

trans-unit.source: This requirement is fulfilled by Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 Service Pack 1.
trans-unit.target: Este requisito se cumple mediante Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 Service Pack 1.

trans-unit.source: This requirement is not fulfilled by Microsoft .NET Framework 4 and later releases of Microsoft .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Este requisito no se cumple con Microsoft .NET Framework 4 y versiones posteriores de Microsoft .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: For information about adding or installing the Windows PowerShell 2.0 engine, and adding or installing the required versions of the Microsoft .NET Framework, see [Installing the Windows PowerShell 2.0 Engine](Installing-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md).
trans-unit.target: Para información sobre cómo agregar o instalar el motor de Windows PowerShell 2.0 y agregar o instalar las versiones necesarias de Microsoft .NET Framework, consulte [Instalación del motor de Windows PowerShell 2.0](Installing-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md).

trans-unit.source: For information about starting the Windows PowerShell 2.0 engine, see [Starting the Windows PowerShell 2.0 Engine](Starting-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener información sobre cómo iniciar el motor de Windows PowerShell 2.0, consulte [Iniciar el motor de Windows PowerShell 2.0](Starting-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md).

trans-unit.source: Windows Preinstallation Environment
trans-unit.target: Entorno de preinstalación de Windows

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 2.0, Windows PowerShell 3.0, and Windows PowerShell 4.0 run in the Windows Preinstallation Environment (Windows PE).
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 2.0, Windows PowerShell 3.0 y Windows PowerShell 4.0 se ejecutan en el Entorno de preinstalación de Windows (Windows PE).

trans-unit.source: However, the following cmdlets are not supported.
trans-unit.target: Sin embargo, no se admiten los siguientes cmdlets.

trans-unit.source: Background Intelligent Transfer Service (BITS) Cmdlets
trans-unit.target: Cmdlets del Servicio de transferencia inteligente en segundo plano (BITS)

trans-unit.source: Get-EventLog
trans-unit.target: Get-EventLog

trans-unit.source: Get-WinEvent
trans-unit.target: Get-WinEvent

trans-unit.source: Save-Help
trans-unit.target: Save-Help

trans-unit.source: Update-Help
trans-unit.target: Update-Help

trans-unit.source: Also, the **WinRM** service is not present on Windows PE.
trans-unit.target: Además, el servicio **WinRM** no está presente en Windows PE.

trans-unit.target: Consulte también
